project.name: J-C460A-CMUD-02-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF16-01
project.description: This test takes input in the form of an integer and creates an array of that size. If the input is too large an exception is raised and the array is initialized to a default size without ever changing the size variable. This leads to an ArrayIndexoutOfBoundsException when the array is accessed.

iopair.name: J-C460A-CMUD-02-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF16-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variables

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="100" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
